message.content:
cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.NE, cs.IR

This paper is likely to belong to the arXiv CS sub-category of cs.CL (Computation and Language) as it deals with natural language processing tasks such as Chinese word segmentation. It could also belong to cs.LG (Machine Learning) as it proposes a flexible multi-criteria learning approach using Switch-LSTMs. Additionally, it could be categorized under cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) as it involves the use of neural networks for segmentation. The paper also involves optimization techniques, which could place it under cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing). Finally, it could be categorized under cs.IR (Information Retrieval) as word segmentation is a crucial step in many IR tasks.
